name: Journey to the Light (Jawn12345)
description:
This is a game about my personal self-reflection throughout the past few years of my life. Your choices may vary and will after the difficultly of the upcoming battle.

Disclaimer: The questions asked are not for everyone. They may trigger some unfortunate memories.

Ghost Sprite:

  • LimeZu, https://limezu.itch.io/

Sound:

  • Freesound - "Sad Horror Music" by TheoTer
